parameters:
\N<Segi>An empty bottle...? Has someone already taken what was
inside...?

\N<Segi>There was a lot of dust and dirt on the inside of the door
to this room. It's proof that it's been sealed for a long
time until I just opened it...

\N<Segi>I see... Judging by the shape of the bottle, it probably
contained some kind of liquid...

\N<Segi>If that's the case, maybe the contents evaporated over the
long period it was stored here...
\N<Segi>I can't tell what was in the bottle... but this is...

\N<Segi>But... if this is what Lord Yuia, Princess Consort, and Riia
entrusted to me...

\N<Segi>That's right... I was persuaded by Zuuteruka to come to the
management office...
